about_the_game:
Life is full of ups and downs, at any moment a successful trader can lose everything and be left penniless. The main character suffered just such a fate. Lost on the stock exchange and a lot of debt, the future looks very bleak. But a ray of hope appears, the hero learns that he inherited an ice cream shop on a sunny island, somewhere in the ocean. Without waiting for his creditors to find him, he drops everything and leaves for a tropical paradise. Arriving on the island, the hero discovers that the shop is in a deplorable state and he has to build everything from scratch. Develop your ice cream business by attracting new customers by all means, because time is short, and the amount that you need to save up for creditors is not at all small.

Features


  • Interactive gallery
  • Atmospheric music
  • Meditative gameplay
  • Sweet girl
